sentences.en: All the details of armour, clothing and weaponry are correctly shown and nicely done.
sentences.cn: 所有盔甲, 服装和武器的细节都得到了良好的表现.
所有武器都需要经常检修.

sentences.en: Blade is testing Shen's new weaponry, and showing off an ultra - sonic projector.
sentences.cn: 刀锋正在测试着沈的新武器, 接着尝试了一下那只超音速投射器.

sentences.en: Both of the above systems appear relevant should China develop anti - ballistic missile weaponry also.
sentences.cn: 上述两种系统关联起来看,中国很可能也在发展 反 弹道导弹武器.

sentences.en: Call Weaponry. Never lack for a weapon.
sentences.cn: 召唤武器: 你不会缺少武器.

sentences.en: China is even coyer about its war - fighting capabilities than it is about its weaponry.
sentences.cn: 相对军备而言,中国甚至更加讳言其作战能力.

sentences.en: It is quite easy to develop this footwork with weaponry movement.
sentences.cn: 在舞动武器的同时展开此类步法是非常容易的.

sentences.en: It is true that modern weaponry depersonalised war.
sentences.cn: 的确，现代武器的使用令战争非人化了。

sentences.en: The modernization level of weaponry and equipment has undergone constant improvement.
sentences.cn: 武器装备现代化水平不断提高.

sentences.en: The Templar is a melee oriented character with minimal ranged support weaponry.
sentences.cn: 圣堂是以近身格斗为主的角色,所以他的武器射程非常近.

sentences.en: The weaponry and equipment management system and mechanism have further improved.
sentences.cn: 武器装备管理体制和机制进一步完善.

sentences.en: Use of nuclear weaponry as a primary weapon in wartime.
sentences.cn: 在战争时期使用核子武器当作主要武器.

sentences.en: Venezuela already spent over $ 4 billion on Russian weaponry.
sentences.cn: 委内瑞拉已经花费大约四十亿美元,由于向俄国采购武器.

sentences.en: We will aggressively seek to control the weaponry of war.
sentences.cn: 我们会主动寻求对战争武器的管制.

sentences.en: Weaponry and equipment management capability has been notably enhanced.
sentences.cn: 武器装备管理能力明显增强.

trans.tran_en: weapons of a particular type or belonging to a particular country or group
